published in journals (see ref. 15, 19, 20 and 21; ref 21 is now PRL, 79,p.4034, 1997). Chapter 6 contains the idea of quantum privacy amplification based on quantum error correction, and the surprising idea that \u201cquantum repeaters\u201d
